item.title: Adding an API to my grind and brew coffee machine and making it smart
item.author: upagge.en
item.description: This post will guide you through on how to connect a dumb Philips grind & brew hd7762 coffee machine to be connected to your home automation and the possibility to add it to your automated morning routine.
